title: Round the world with no tech or company, India-born sailor is risking it all for love of sport - ThePrint
content: Round the world with no tech or company, India-born sailor is risking it all for love of sport  ThePrint
description: Gaurav Shinde had to weather plenty of storms before qualifying for Golden Globe Race, which involves circumnavigating the globe without using any technology devised after 1968.
